replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
你是只要出现waiting for server就崩端吗？
如果是的话，可以更新下theoneprobe mod 如果问题没有解决，那就换个方块显示模组如:hwyla
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/the-one-probe
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/hwyla
